private.title: Private leagues
private.message: Join a private league if somebody has given you a league code to enter.

public.title: Public leagues
public.name: League Name
public.message: Public leagues allow you to compete against 20 game players in a classic league. You can join up to 3 public leagues.
public.note: Note, you can't remove your team from a public league after the league has started, once the challenge is on there's no quitting.
